channel.title: mycatalog updates
channel.description: 'My Catalog' uses the IBM Cloud catalog API to retrieve data from the catalog. It attempts to be as accurate as possible. This feed shows additions, updates, removals from the catalog. Use with care. It is a work-in-progress :)

item.title: [updated] Wasabi AiR (wasabi-air) has changed the description of the plan named paygo
item.description:
*before*: Pay As You Go Plan : Wasabi AiR ($12.99 / AiR hour) + Wasabi Cloud Storage ($8.99 / TB / mo) with Premium Support
Daily Wasabi rate:
$8.99/TB/mo = $8.99/1024/30 = $0.00029624 unit price per GB per day
To get started subscribe today or request a demo : ibm@wasabi.com, *after*: Pay As You Go Plan : Wasabi AiR ($12.99 / AiR hour) + Wasabi Cloud Storage ($8.99 / TB / mo) with Premium Support

item.title: [updated] Wasabi Hot Cloud Storage (wasabi-cloud-storage) has changed the description of the plan named pay-as-you-go
item.description:
*before*: Pay As You Go Plan : Wasabi Cloud Storage ($6.99 / TB / mo) plus Premium Support
Daily Wasabi rate:
$6.99/TB/mo = $6.99/1024/30 = $0 .00022754 unit price per GB per day With Premium Support = $0.00024382 unit price per GB per day
To get started subscribe today or request a demo : ibm@wasabi.com, *after*: Pay As You Go Plan : Wasabi Cloud Storage ($6.99 / TB / mo) plus Premium Support
